Any¶

class floulib.Any¶

Bases: Singleton

Class which creates a Singleton with a grade of membership equal to 1.0. Any() can be used in the Is() method in Rule().

Note

Any is a subclass of Singleton, therefore all methods in Singleton may be used.

__init__()¶

Constructor

Return type:

None.

floulib
